fxInfo_clarification: Missing data within a time-series is interpolated using linear interpolation.
fxInfo_question: What is the exchange rate of the local currency to the US Dollar?
fxInfo_sources: Clio Infra (clio-infra.eu), drawing on Officer (2011), Heston, Summers and Aten (2012), Reinhart and Rogoff (N.d.).
